ARABIC: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا جِئْنَا مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍۭ بِشَهِيدٍ وَجِئْنَا بِكَ عَلَىٰ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ شَهِيدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How will it be when We bring a witness from every nation and bring you as a witness against them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How shall it be when We call witnesses from each and every people and call you as witness over them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Consider, then, when We shall bring forward witnesses from every community, and will bring you (O Muhammad!) as a witness against them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How will it be when We call for a witness from every nation and have you, (Muhammad), testify against them all?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So how will it be when We bring a witness from each nation (religion), and We bring you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) as a witness and a watcher over them? (The Holy Prophet is a witness from Allah.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: How (will it be) then, when We bring from each nation a witness and We bring you (O Muhammad) as a witness against these people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: How will it be, then, when We bring from every people a witness and bring you as a witness against these?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: How then shall it be, when We bring forward from every nation a witness, and bring thee to witness against those?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But how (will it be with them) when We bring of every people a witness, and We bring thee (O Muhammad) a witness against these?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: What will they do when We bring a witness from each community and bring you as a witness against these people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: How will it be then, when We shall bring, out of each community, a witness, and We shall bring thee against these as a witness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So how shall it be, when We bring a witness from every nation and We bring you as a witness to them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: How then if We brought from each people a witness, and We brought thee as a witness against these people!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: How (will it be) then, when We bring from each nation a witness and We bring you (O Muhammad SAW) as a witness against these people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: How then shall it be when We bring forward from every nation a witness, and bring you (Prophet Muhammad) to witness against those!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then how will it be, when We bring a witness from every community, and We bring you as a witness against these?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So how [will it be] when We bring from every nation a witness and we bring you, [O Muhammad] against these [people] as a witness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:41]   So how shall it be, the predicament of the disbelievers, when We bring forward from every community a witness, to testify against it regarding its deeds, and this shall be its prophet; and We bring you, O Muhammad (s), as witness against these?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But how (will it be with them)) how shall the unbelievers react (when we bring of every people a witness) a prophet who will testify that he has delivered the message to them, (and We bring thee) Muhammad (a witness against these?) it is also said that this means: We bring you, Muhammad, a witness in favour of your Community, testifying that it is reliable and upright. This is because his Community will be a witness for the other prophets against their nations when the latter will deny having received any message from them.
